c:resource.c:name: Localhost OpenDJ
c:resource.description: LDAP resource using an Identity Connector Framework LDAP connector.

connectorRef.description: Reference to the ICF LDAP connector.

expression.description: Expression that assigns a fixed value

script.description: XPath expression that is using a variable declared above

correlation.q:description: Correlation expression is a search query. Following search query will look for users that have "name" equal to the "uid" attribute of the account. Simply speaking, it will look for match in usernames in the IDM and the resource. The correlation rule always looks for users, so it will not match any other object type.

p:referenceType.description: this is some description or something like that, which should be also stored in DB

task.description: Definition of a live sychnronization task. It will poll changelog and pull in changes

xsd:appinfo.a:help: Name of unique attribute in current CSV file.
Flag if connector does have to parse multivalue attributes with char defined in Multivalue delimiter
Delimiter for multivalue attributes in CSV record (escaped as regexp, if needed).
User password attribute name is not required. Its used only in authenticate operation.
Attribute value qualifier in CSV record (escaped as regexp, if needed).
Path to CSV file with records.
Delimiter character between fields in one CSV record (escaped as regexp, if needed).

exclusion.description: A judge cannot be a pirate at the same time. At least not openly.

org.name: F0085
org.description: The office of the most respectful Governor.

report.name: Audit logs report
report.template: <jasperReport xmlns="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/jasperreports" name="testreport" uuid="67e465c5-46ea-40d2-bea0-469c6cf38937"> <property name="net.sf.jasperreports.awt.ignore.missing.font" value="true"/> <property name="net.sf.jasperreports.export.pdf.force.linebreak.policy" value="true"/> <import value="com.evolveum.midpoint.report.ReportUtils"/> <template><![CDATA[$P{BaseTemplateStyles}\]\]></template> <parameter name="BaseTemplateStyles" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="LOGO_PATH" class="java.lang.String"/> <queryString language="hql"> <![CDATA[select aer.timestamp as timestamp, aer.initiatorName as initiator, aer.eventType as eventType, aer.eventStage as eventStage, aer.targetName as targetName, aer.targetType as targetType, aer.targetOwnerName as targetOwnerName, aer.outcome as outcome, aer.message as message, odo.delta as delta from RObjectDeltaOperation as odo join odo.record as aer where aer.timestamp >= '2000-01-01' and aer.timestamp <= '2020-12-31' order by aer.timestamp\]\]></queryString> </jasperReport>
report.templateStyle: <jasperTemplate xmlns="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/dtds/jaspertemplate.dtd"> <style fontSize="10" hAlign="Left" isDefault="true" isPdfEmbedded="false" name="Base" pdfEncoding="Cp1252" pdfFontName="Helvetica" vAlign="Middle"/> <style backcolor="#267994" fontSize="26" forecolor="#FFFFFF" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" name="Title" style="Base"/> </jasperTemplate>
